All functions

agreement

Calculate percent agreement.

as.data.frame

Converts the results of simulateICC to a data.frame

IRRsim_demo

Run the Inter-Rater Reliability shiny app.

IRRsim-package

Simulate Inter-Rater Reliability Statistics

kappam.fleiss2

Fleiss' Kappa for m raters

plot

Plot the results of an IRR simulation.

print

Prints the results from simulateICC.

print

Print the result of summary.IRRsim

simulateICC

Calultes intraclass correlations (ICC) for simulated samples of raters and evaluations.

simulateRatingMatrix

Simulate a rating matrix.

summary

Returns a summary of a IRR simulation.
